content: Missing diagnosis -FHIR requires use of diagnosis and it should be ICD9/ICD10 code as per the C4BB (Carin for BlueButton). However EDI 835 transaction (remittance) does not have diagnosis codes at all. As it's a required binding, I understand that data absent extension cannot be used. Can anybody please shed light on this? Thanking you in advance. @Paul Knapp @Corey Spears @Lloyd McKenzie
Why would you be trying to use an 835, record of payment, to make an EOB and not the 837 which is the claim, which does have diagnosis data?

This question appears to have also been posted on the implementers stream. An additional response was provided there: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/EOB.2F835.20mapping-Missing.20Diagnosis

@Tushar Nair - for the future, please only post a question in one place at a time and give a couple of business days for a response before trying elsewhere unless someone specifically directs you elsewhere. (It helps us keep conversations more coherent.)
@Lloyd McKenzie noted. @Corey Spears thank you !
